reviews.review_msg: She explains the lectures pretty well and is specific to make students easy to understand and study. Some quizzes are trickly, but study the lectures from her notes, then you will do well in this course. If you have questions you can directly contact her. Highly recommend students to take her class. Good professor!

She explained each chapter in every week very detail and was easy to understand. For example, she gave the everyday life basis example to apply with the microeconomics principle. Therefore, I could not agree more that I never get bored when listening to her lecture. Moreover, she also has a good sense of humour. The lecture sheet is detailed.

She's amazing but her quizzes are challenging. You have to read the questions carefully since they're tricky. But Shauna is a good prof herself, you should visit her office hours, she's ready to help. Her lectures are clear and understandable. I wouldn't take her again only because of quizzes. BTW she doesn't have mids, only tests every week

Shauna explains very well but her exams are quite unrelated to her exams. She is a good teacher, helpful but it is difficult to pass her course. She has good notes that will be helpful in future classes as well. I highly recommend recording her lecture to help you in the exams.
Shauna is a good teacher however her in class questions are so easy compared to her exams. She is a hilarious teacher but her exams are so hard. Be prepared.
The best economic instructor. I love her
One of the most amazing instructors I have ever met. Choose and learn with her, you will not regret.
she is nice. she has enough material to you and you don't need to buy the book. also, her teaching skill is very good. the exam is very fair and it is not very difficult.
Interesting lecturesclear notes thoroughly explained examples and excellent exercise materials.
One of the best professor.. She is a friend more that a teacher. Really helpful !!
